channel.title: The Software Lifecycle Blog
channel.description: [Via Rob] Some smart folks over at Avanade have started blogging about the Software Lifecycle (being Avanade, you'd expect this to be heavily focused on VSTS and it is). If anyone is going to be getting serious about using VSTS...
channel.dc:creator: Martin

item.title: Comment by Rana+00:00
item.description: When i click on Software Lifecycle link, iam getting the following error. "The resource cannot be found." http://sdlcguy.com/blogs/the_software_lifecycle_blog/default.aspx
item.dc:creator: Rana

item.title: Comment by Martin+00:00
item.description:
Looks like the blog has moved. I've updated the article to now point to http://www.sdlcguy.com/blog/default.aspx
Thanks for letting me know,
Martin.
item.dc:creator: Martin
